content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Mr. Trabelsi. I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price that will be mutually beneficial. May I ask what you had in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have an offer of 500 Euros per month for the apartment. Is that acceptable to you?

If not, what price would you be willing to accept?

If you agree to the price of 500 Euros, say: "I agree to the price of 500 Euros". If not, say: "I am not willing to accept 500 Euros. What other prices would you consider?"
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mr. Trabelsi. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, I must say that 500 Euros per month is not an offer that I am willing to accept at this time. I believe that the apartment is worth more than that, and I am looking for a rental price that reflects its value.

That being said, I am open to hearing your other proposals. What other prices would you be willing to consider?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to accept 600 Euros per month. I believe that is a fair price for the apartment.

If you agree to the price of 600 Euros, say: "I agree to the price of 600 Euros". If not, say: "I am not willing to accept 600 Euros. What other prices would you consider?"
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your counteroffer, Mr. Trabelsi. While I appreciate your willingness to increase the rental price, I am still not willing to accept 600 Euros per month. I believe that the apartment is worth more than that, and I am looking for a rental price that reflects its value.

That being said, I am open to hearing your other proposals. What other prices would you be willing to consider?
name: Heinrich Heine
